import{Map}from'immutable';//액션 이
var LOGIN='LOGIN';var LOGOUT='LOGOUT';//
export var login={type:LOGIN};export var logout={type:LOGOUT};export var initialState={user:null};//리듀서
var handleActions=function handleActions(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOGIN:return{user:action.user};break;case LOGOUT:return{user:action.user};break;default:return state;}};export default handleActions;
